```{r}
n_samples <- 100
alpha <- 1.5
beta <- 2.0

x_norm <- rnorm(n_samples, 5, 3)
x_binomial <- rbinom(n_samples, 1, 0.5)
error <- rnorm(n_samples, 0, 0.5)

x <- x_binomial
y <- alpha + beta * x + error

ggplot() + geom_point(aes(x, y))
```
